segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the water overflowing from the sink, and it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting larger and larger, and I'm worried someone might slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy standing on a stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he might fall at any moment, and it makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her share of the cookies, seemingly unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the calm garden outside, which contrasts sharply with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like the woman is in her own little bubble, completely oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of unease watching this scene unfold, and I hope everything turns out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a sense of anticipation, wondering what will happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
